item.description: This is a beautiful place with streams, beaver dam, and a  waterfall.  Afterward, we’ll go for lunch.  No charge for walk.  For info, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to walk:  I‑84W Exit 38 (Rt. 6 Bristol), go about 6-7 miles (pass Home Depot, Stop & Shop, then Blockbuster), at RR tracks, turn right onto Burlington Ave. (Rt. 69) for 3.7 miles, turn left at sign for Sessions Woods Wildlife Area, go up hill, parking lot on left.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet in the parking lot.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Walk & Lunch
